name: reunite
description: App for reuniting families separated by natural disasters

scripts.start:dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run nodemon" "cd client && npm start" "cd visualiser-client && npm start"
scripts.start:test: concurrently "cd server && npm start" "cd client && npm start" "cd visualiser-client && npm start"
scripts.test: (cd server && npm test) && (cd client && npm test)
scripts.test:components: (cd server && npm run test:full) && (cd client && npm test)
scripts.test:integration: npm run start:test & (wait-on http://localhost:41002 && cypress run && npm stop)
scripts.install: (cd server && npm install) && (cd client && npm install) && (cd visualiser-client && npm install)
scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:visualiser
scripts.deploy: npm run build && ibmcloud dev deploy

author: Project Reunite <project.reunited@gmail.com>
